snippet: Some Republicans see Representative Paul D. Ryan as a pragmatic deal maker, but others see the deal as a betrayal and challenged his status as the thinking man’s conservative.
abstract: Rep Paul D Ryan is under fire from conservatives after striking bipartisan budget deal with Sen Patty Murray, Democrat of Washington; some fellow Republicans see Ryan as a pragmatic deal maker, but other see deal as a betrayal and are challenging his status.
lead_paragraph: Some Republicans see Representative Paul D. Ryan as a pragmatic deal maker, but others see the deal as a betrayal and challenged his status as the thinking man’s conservative.

headline.main: Bipartisan Budget Deal Puts Ryan Under Fire From Fellow Conservatives
headline.print_headline: Bipartisan Budget Deal Puts Ryan Under Fire From Fellow Conservatives
